name: Primordial Soup (jirehcwe, gingivitiss, jacjacjackie, anothernoodle)
description:
Primordial Soup is a relaxing single player game about discovery and evolution (sort of). Discover new creatures as you try to mix and match creatures in the primordial soup of life!

Double Tap to duplicate

Hold to delete

Drag to move creatures around

Stop dragging to try and combine

Underlined creatures are final (cannot form new creatures)

If you must refer, here is the creature recipe list :

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1etE2OKji5Y1ywhStEeP5JYdoeCBMCBrw68v7E0F5...
